text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea pubistyla is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Borneo, and occurs in Sarawak and west Kalimantan.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea pubistyla". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31926A9669233. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31926A9669233.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
